title: Familierestaurant Kapitein Haak
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has a vegan-friendly label from the Dutch Vegan Society, and website states vegans are welcome. Has a 100% vegan 4-course menu and several vegetarian dishes. Family restaurant, child-friendly. Pirate-ship inspired decoration. Organize special events for children and for adults. As of June 2014, the only vegan-friendly place in the area. Free Wi-Fi.
